src_original: tasminn avasare tatra vṛddhārāmodakārthinī /  kacaṅgalābhidhā kumbhaṃ dhṛtvā kūpāntike 'carat // Rm_17.14{14} //
tgt_original: 彼聚落中有一老母名迦戰羅，將欲取水，而向井邊。

src_original: tatra tāṃ bhagavān dṛṣṭvā matvā janmāntaraprasūṃ /  ānaṃdaṃ samupāmaṃtrya pura evam abhāṣata // Rm_17.15{15} //
tgt_original: 世尊見彼調伏時至，告具壽阿難陀曰：

src_original: gachānaṃda tvam etasyāṃ vṛddhāyāṃ prārthayāmṛtaṃ /
tgt_original: 「汝今可詣彼老母所，告言：

src_original: bhagavāṃs tṛṣito mātas tad ambu dīyatām iti // Rm_17.16{16} //
tgt_original: 『世尊須水，汝可持奉。

src_original: tadā sā sahasā kṛtvā ghaṭaṃ śuddhāmbupūritaṃ /  svayam eva samādāya tatrābhisaṃmukhācarat // Rm_17.22{22} //  tatra sā samupāśritya prādrākṣīt taṃ munīśvaraṃ /  dvātriṃśallakṣaṇāśītivyaṃjanapratimaṇḍitaṃ // Rm_17.23{23} //  vyāmaprabhābhibhāsvaṃtaṃ śatasūryādhikaprabhaṃ /
tgt_original: 我今奉水。 」時彼老母以滿瓶水，速往佛所，見彼如來具三十二相八十種好，光明赫奕超千日輪，如寶山行。

src_original: jaṃgamam iva ratnābhaṃ saumyaṃ samantabhadrakaṃ // Rm_17.24{24} //  saha taddarśaṇāt tatra putrasnehasamudbhavāḥ /  stanābhyāṃ praśrutās tasyāḥ kṣīradhārā niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.25{25} //  tato dharmānubhāvena smṛtvā pūrvabhavātmajaṃ /
tgt_original: 時彼老母見世尊已，便生恭敬，如愛子心，即便舉手，欲抱世尊，唱言：

src_original: putra putreti soktvā taṃ pariṣvektum upācarat // Rm_17.26{26} //
tgt_original: 子！

src_original: tadā te bhikṣavaḥ sarve evaṃ tāṃ samupadrutāṃ /
tgt_original: 」諸苾芻等即前遮止：

src_original: tad dṛṣṭvā bhagavāṃ chastā sarvāṃs tāṃ sāṃghikān api /
tgt_original: 」佛告諸苾芻：

src_original: mā bhikṣava imāṃ vṛddhāṃ dhārāyatātra muñcata /
tgt_original: 「汝等不須遮此老母。 所以者何？

src_original: paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā mātā me bhūyataḥ purā // Rm_17.29{29} //
tgt_original: 此老母已曾五百生中，與我為母。

src_original: tatpūrvajanmamāteyaṃ putrasnehānubhāvinī /  samāliṃgatum īchantī mama gātre pradhāvati // Rm_17.30{30} //  yady atraiṣā nivāryyete gātra me śleṣmaṇād api /  idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kamṭhād asyāḥ kṣaret kṣaṇāt // Rm_17.31{31} //
tgt_original: 若不令抱我身者，即吐熱血。

src_original: kṛtajñatām anusmṛtvā dṛṣṭvemāṃ putralālasāṃ /  kāruṇyād gātrasaṃśleṣaṃ dadāmy atrānukaṃpayā // Rm_17.32{32} //  iti śāstrā samādiṣṭaṃ śrutvā te sarvasāṃghikāḥ /  tāṃ śāstuḥ pūrvaprasūṃ matvā vyavatasthuḥ savismayāḥ // Rm_17.33{33} //
tgt_original: 」世尊見彼心生子想，念此恩愛，生慈愍心，便即引項，令老母抱。

src_original: tatkṣaṇād urddhavāhuḥ sā samīkṣya taṃ munīśvaraṃ /  sahasā saṃpradhāvitvā samāliṃgya namac ciraṃ // Rm_17.34{34} //  tataś cirāt samutthāya sā vṛddhā sāñjalir mudā /  śrīghanaṃ taṃ samālokya puras tasthau samāhitā // Rm_17.35{35} //
tgt_original: 彼既抱已，心生歡喜，聽佛說法。

src_original: tadā sa bhagavān dṛṣṭvā tāṃ puraḥ samupāsthitāṃ /  āryyasatyaṃ samārabhya saddharmaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_17.36{36} //  tat saddharmāmṛtaṃ pītvā sa vṛddhāpi kacaṃgalā /  pariśuddhāśayā bhadrā bodhicaryā prabodhitā // Rm_17.37{37} //
tgt_original: 爾時世尊知彼根性，隨機演說，令證四聖諦理。

src_original: satkāyadṛṣṭibhūmīdhraṃ viṃśatiśikharodgataṃ /  nirbhidya jñānavajreṇa dṛṣṭasatyaprabodhitā // Rm_17.38{38} //
tgt_original: 母聞法已，以金剛智杵摧滅二十種薩迦耶見煩惱山峯，證預流果，得見諦理，即作是言：

src_original: yadā sa bhagavañ chāstā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ subhāṣitaṃ /  saṃkṣepeṇa samuddiśya dhyānāgāre samāśrayat // Rm_17.135{36} //
tgt_original: 是時世尊與諸苾芻尼，略說法要已，入室宴坐。

src_original: tadā sā bhikṣuṇī tatra kacaṃgalā subhāṣiṇī /  bhikṣuṇīnāṃ sabhāmadhye sutrāntaṃ samupādiśat // Rm_17.136{37} //
tgt_original: 是時戰迦羅苾芻尼，所聞法要，為他廣說。

src_original: tac chrutvā bhagavāṃs tatra tayā sūtrāṃtadeśite /  sarvāns tān sāṃghikān bhikṣūn samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.137{38} //
tgt_original: 于時世尊告諸苾芻：

src_original: eṣo 'grā bhikṣavo mātā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mamāśrame /  sūtrāntabhāgakartṝṇāṃ yad uteyaṃ kacaṃgalā // Rm_17.138{39} //
tgt_original: 「此戰迦羅，於我苾芻尼聲聞眾中，分析經法，而得第一。

src_original: ity ādiṣṭaṃ munīndreṇa śrutvā sarve 'pi sāṃghikāḥ /  savismayā munīndraṃ taṃ paprachus tat purākṛtaṃ // Rm_17.139{40} //  bhagavann anayā karmaṃ kiṃ prakṛtaṃ purākṛtaṃ /  imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.140{41} //
tgt_original: 」時諸苾芻皆生疑惑，為斷疑故，而問世尊：

src_original: yeneyam śāsane bauddhe vṛddhā pravrajitādhunā /  sākṣād arhatvam āsādya bhavati brahmacāriṇī // Rm_17.141{42} //  kiṃ vānayā purākarma kṛtaṃ kutra kadā kathaṃ /
tgt_original: 「彼戰迦羅苾芻尼，曾作何業，年邁出家？ 復以何緣而受貧賤？

src_original: sūtrāntabhāgakartṝṇāṃ yenāgreyaṃ bhavaty api // Rm_17.142{43} //  kiṃcāpi prakṛtaṃ karmaṃ purānayā kadā kathaṃ /  yenātra paścime garbhāvāse na dhārito bhavān // Rm_17.143{44} //
tgt_original: 於最後生而不懷孕，復得出家，證羅漢果？ 說法之中，云何最勝？

src_original: etat sarvaiḥ parijñāya bhagavānn asyāḥ purākṛtaṃ /  imān sarvān sabhāsīnān prabodhayitum arhati // Rm_17.144{45} //  (Rm 224)  iti tair bhikṣubhiḥ sarvaiḥ prārthite sa munīśvaraḥ /  sarvāṃs tān sāṃghikān dṛṣṭvā samāmaṃtryaivam ādiśat // Rm_17.145{46} //  śṛṇuta bhikṣavaḥ sarve yad yat kṛtaṃ purānayā /  tat tat sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi yuṣmākaṃ cittabodhane // Rm_17.146{47} //
tgt_original: 」佛告諸苾芻：

src_original: purā me bodhisatvasya bodhicaryānucāriṇaḥ /  paṃcajanmaśatāny eṣā janany āsīn niraṃtaraṃ // Rm_17.147{48} //  tadā me dadato dānam antarāyaḥ kṛto 'nayā /
tgt_original: 「此戰迦羅苾芻尼，先作白業故，積集資糧，乃至果報自受。

src_original: yadi naiṣā tadā dānaṃ vighnā mamākariṣyati /  naiṣādhunā daridrātra bhavati hi kadā cana // Rm_17.151{52} //  pravrajyāyāṃ ca me vighnaṃ yadi naiṣākariṣyata /
tgt_original: 我於往昔行菩薩道時，曾為我母。 由彼業故，年老出家。
